question: Which of the following set of the following biosphere reserves in India is a part of the World Network of Biosphere Reserves?
option2: Gulf of Manner, Nokrek, Panchmarhi and Simlipal
option3: Gulf of Manner, Kanchanjunga, Nokrek and Seshachalam
answer: Gulf of Manner, Nokrek, Panchmarhi and Simlipal
explanation: The list of the biosphere reserves in India which is a part of the World Network of Biosphere Reserves- Gulf of Manner, Nokrek, Panchmarhi, Simlipal, Nilgiri, Nanda Devi, Sunderbans.
